name: relelrni
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpan(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, crn(c1)), wrel(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))
-| wrel(c1)
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))
-| wrel(c1)
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, crn(c1)))
-| wrel(c1)

comment: The second argument of a binary relation belongs to its range. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2015.)
